title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel by Harper Lee published in 1960. It is widely studied in schools and deals with serious issues of race and rape.
A dystopian novel by George Orwell that explores the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A 1994 drama film about a man sentenced to life in prison for a crime he didn't commit.

title: The Godfather
description: A 1972 crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola, based on the novel of the same name by Mario Puzo.

title: Chez Panisse
description: A Berkeley, California restaurant known for its organic, locally sourced ingredients.

title: Noma
description: A Copenhagen restaurant known for its reinvention and interpretation of Nordic cuisine.

description: The capital city of France, known for its art, gastronomy, and culture.

title: Kyoto, Japan
